alert.note: Alert for Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 4:23PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Saline and south central Pulaski Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 423 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Salem in Saline County, or near Bryant, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... Benton... Bryant... Southwest Little Rock... Shannon Hills... Otter Creek... Geyer Springs... Mabelvale... Salem in Saline County... East End... Alexander... Baseline... Bauxite... Avilla... Sardis... Congo... Vimy Ridge... Grape... Parkers-Iron Springs... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
